sourcesContent:
<template>
    <card-padrao-component>
        <template v-slot:titulo>
            Usuario
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-text-field
                v-model="search"
                append-icon="mdi-magnify"
                label="Pesquisar"
                single-line
                hide-details
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn
                outlined
                large
                right
                color="primary"
                @click="novo()"
                >
                Novo
            </v-btn>
        </template>
        <template v-slot:texto>
            <v-data-table
                :headers="headers"
                :items="clientes"
                :search="search"
                :footer-props="{
                    'items-per-page-text':'Linhas por pagina',
                    'items-per-page-options': [5, 10, 20, 50]
                }"
                :header-props="{
                    'sortByText': 'Ordenar'
                }"
            >
            </v-data-table>
        </template>
    </card-padrao-component>

<!-- 
    <card-padrao-component v-if="cadastroUsuarioComponent == true">
                <template v-slot:titulo>Usuario</template>
                <template v-slot:texto>
                    <cadastro-usuario-component :salvar="salvarUsuario"/>
                </template>
                <template v-slot:actions>
                    <v-btn
                        outlined
                        large
                        block
                        color="green"
                        @click="SalvarUsuario()"
                        >
                        Confirmar
                    </v-btn>
                </template>
            </card-padrao-component> -->
</template>
<script>

import CardPadraoComponent from '../Field/CardPadraoComponent.vue'

export default {
  components: { CardPadraoComponent },
    name: 'ListaUsuariosComponent',

    data: () => ({
        headers: [
            { text: 'Codigo', value: 'Id' },
            { text: 'Nome', value: 'Nome' },
            { text: 'Data Cadastro', value: 'DataCadastro' },
            { text: 'Ativo', value: 'Ativo' },
        ],
        clientes: [],
        search: '',
    })
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
